Package ezxpns.GUI

Interface Summary
CategoryHandlerInterface Interface to handle the categories between the Graphical User Interface and the data storage (upon GUI Exit)
ConfigManagerInterface To manage the configurations of the GUI - place where all the constants are stored
(i.e.
PaymentMethodHandlerInterface Interface to handle the payment modes between the Graphical User Interface and the data storage (upon GUI Exit)
RecordHandlerInterface To handle the records between the Graphical User Interface and the data storage (upon GUI Exit)
SearchHandlerInterface This interface denotes the possible searches the user may do as well as assists the UI side
in disseminating the search request, and returning formatted, relevant search results
back to the UI component.
 

Class Summary
AlertManagerDialog Note: This class is now marked for removal, but kept for reference
CategoryFrame Window for users to manage their targets and categories

MenuReport  
MenuTarget  
OverviewPanel This is the overview a.k.a summary panel that display the user's balance, in and out cash flow.
PanelExpense  
PanelIncome GUI Form for Income records
PanelMain Panel Containing the Form for user to fill up - to create new record
PanelOption Panel containing the options available to this frame
PanelRecur Panel to store all the options pertaining to recurrance of a record
PanelTip This panel contains the educational tips displays at the bottom of the screen
[To Be Moved to a file on its on in the next iteration]
RecordDisplayPanel Panel Object containing each of the records, with the functionality
Will display in the format <Amt> on <Name> <Category> <Day> <Time>
RecordFrame This is a JFrame object (Window) that allows users to enter a new record (Expense/Income) into the EzXpns
RecordsDisplayPanel Panel Class containing the inner workings of the Records' bit on the main screen
RecordsListerPanel  
ReportDialog Note: This class is marked for removal, but currently kept for referencing sake
ReportFrame The window to handle all the extensive record analysis and report
Should contain a form for the user to enter the starting and the ending date of the records analysis
ResultPanel Panel to contain all the query results
SavingsOverviewPanel The Savings Panel for the home screen - to display the Needs-Wants-Savings Ratio
Will be implemented in the near future (iteration 2)
SearchBtnPanel Panel to containing the buttons for functionality
SearchFormPanel  
SearchFrame The window to handle the searching and querying needs of the user
SearchRequest Wrapper class to contains search query parameters
May support multiple queries (future iterations)
but not handled in the master class for now.
TargetOverviewPanel This is the panel in which will be slotted into the MainGUI (the main interface) as the display for the visual breakdown of the targets on the user defined categories (Food, Transport, etc...)
UIControl To assist EzXpns in managing all the GUI Windows <<<<<<< local ======= Implements ActionListener for the main menu.
